<center>

**SmallWeb Ltd** is a company based in South Wales, United Kingdom. Since starting the company in October 2019 our customer base has grown by several hundreds and we proudly host over 900 domains across 3 continents. 

After several weeks of Luxembourg being out of stock, it's back with a brand new server running CentOS. 

Amsterdam | Germany | Los Angeles | Luxembourg | London | Melbourne | New York | Singapore
